title: Karma and Gnar gg
body:
holy sh!t the kite potential of that combo is disgusting. Playing trundle, both were impossible to lock down.

I feel like I brought a potato to a sniper battle.

replies.body:
i see ur problem... 

u were playing trundle.

> [{quoted}](name=Danklight Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=3I3jqW7O,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-23T06:25:59.863+0000)
>
> i see ur problem... 
> 
> u were playing trundle.

i like ur thinking :)
back off trundle he's my go to troll champ
nothing wrong with a bit of troll love. But yeah, in that matchup he was next to useless. They have both pokey slows and high mobility (jump for gnar and speed for karma) and he just got ruined.
